title: New FTX boss condemns crypto exchange's failure
description: John Ray says there was a "complete absence of trustworthy financial information" at the company.

title: Lab-grown chicken safe to eat, say US regulators
description: It is the first time a meat product grown in a lab has been cleared for human consumption in the US.

title: World of Warcraft to go offline in China
description: A number of Activision Blizzard titles will disappear, following the end of an arrangement with publisher NetEase.
